name: Dirty Dealing
description:
You come to expect many things being a detective, but your best friend's dead body wasn't one of them.

Dirty Dealing is a game about solving your best friend's murder. You play as the lead detective on the case, trying to piece together what happened to your friend. You spend a day visiting various sections of the city of Ranparr; a coastal city known for its excellent trading via cargo ships. There are several different locations to explore, and depending on which destinations the player chooses impacts on the kinds of evidence and interactions with characters the player will experience. The player must choose their responses wisely; after all, not everyone is who they seem to be on the surface.

FULL SCREEN MODE RECOMMENDED!

[A second year Games Design project] [Roughly 13K]
